title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: AdLunam is an excellent launchpad that allocates tokens to the investors and its users based on an innovative proof-of-allocation model! Using this model, small-scale investors like me can engage with the project before its IDO and get allocation based on my engagement! AdLunam is one of the few projects in the crypto space that helps small-scale investors in getting a fair shot at investing in interesting and profitable projects! Cannot wait to start investing in it! You can find more about it here. adlunam.cc

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: Recently Team AdLunam has shared their past six months journey explain what their team worked on during Q1 and Q2 of 2022.Here's a glimpse of what they've worked on,- Fundraising: Raised $2M USD in 5 Days- Development- Projects- Partnerships: Evolving partnerships with Hypersign, Polygon. Unmarshal. Bluewheel, Viral Ventures, FiPi, IBC etc- Advisors: Onboarded Aanchal Thakur, CEO of Spherium Finance & Praskash Somosundram, CEO of Enjin Starter as Advisors.- Community- Airdrops/Contests- TGE…and much more!Get all the details here: https://t.co/Tmuv3RNpVL

comments.author: ANKIT007
comments.body: AdLunam is the industry’s first NFT-integrated Engage to Earn seed crowdfunding and IDO launchpad using a Proof of Attention model. An Initial DEX Offering (IDO) is a revolutionary and creative type of decentralized and permissionless crowdfunding platform that enables a previously unheard-of method of fundraising in the cryptocurrency market. IDO platforms enable anyone from all walks of life and all corners of the globe to participate in a new project developed on a decentralized exchange platform utilizing tokens.
